  <citation>

ENDING IN QUESTION"/>

result:
ENDING IN COLON
“colon:” colon
“period.” colon
“semicolon”; colon
“exclamation!” colon
“question?” colon

ENDING IN PERIOD
“colon:” period
“period.” period
“semicolon”; period
“exclamation!” period
“question?” period

ENDING IN SEMICOLON
“colon:” semicolon
“period.”; semicolon
“semicolon”;; semicolon
“exclamation!” semicolon
“question?” semicolon

ENDING IN EXCLAMATION
“colon:” exclamation
“period.” exclamation
“semicolon”; exclamation
“exclamation!” exclamation
“question?” exclamation

ENDING IN QUESTION
“colon:” question
“period.” question
“semicolon”; question
“exclamation!” question
“question?” question
